I get that the get involved page is very important but either change the menu item's name or fix the website so that it displays the release notes and add a menu item for get involved.

Confused end users will be thankful!

> Ok, but why when a user who well isn't me for instance wants to see the release
> notes they will be very confused when they end up at the get involved page.

They won't, because a user who well isn't you won't be using pre-releases. For (shipped) releases, the releases/seamonkey%VERSION% page actually exists so no redirect to dev/get-involved happens.

In any case, I am not really in favor of arbitrarily removing menu items without more of a reason then what Comment 0 gave. This kind of stuff makes me upset without end.
